discord_chat_mod.command.mention.unknown: There is no user with name %s in the channel #%s

discord_chat_mod.error.invalid_channel_e: The specified Discord channel ID (%s) is invalid or the bot does not have access to the specified channel
discord_chat_mod.error.missing_permissio:
The bot does not have enough rights to work correctly in the channel %s! Missing:
%s
discord_chat_mod.error.prepare_message_e: Error sending message! Make sure the bot has access to the channel and the right to send messages.
discord_chat_mod.error.send_embed_error: Error sending message! Make sure the bot has access to the channel, as well as the rights to send messages and embed links.
discord_chat_mod.error.send_message_erro:
Error sending message!
Cause: %s
Make sure the bot has permission to embed links and attach files.
discord_chat_mod.server.status.available: There is no one on the server
discord_chat_mod.webhook.error.invalid_c: A webhook cannot be created in the specified channel (%s). Standard messaging mode will be used.
discord_chat_mod.webhook.error.missing_p: Bot does not have Manage Webhooks permission on channel %s. Standard messaging mode will be used.
